title: Can Nashor's Tooth Be Nashor's Tooth?
body:
{{item:3115}} 
That's not a tooth, that's a sword.

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/kbx3jOa.jpg

Riot should change the teeth of Baron to match with the icon in game.
I'm proud of you.
So much pride in this comment group I am waiting for everyone to take off their clothes and wear funny colorful feathers.
https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/615418171307089920/8m8VQ_9z.jpg
{{champion:201}} is proud of you as well
same {{champion:17}}
I'm proud of you too.
It could be a tooth that was sharpened and shaped into a sword ;)
Yeah, I'm going with that until they turn it into a tooth dagger.

> [{quoted}](name=Blackstone01,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PGdQYpwr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-08T07:29:13.860+0000)
>
> tooth dagger.

Considering how large baron was in past cinematics, a "dagger" is quite the understatement.
TBF, compare a 6 stack {{champion:31}} to Baron in game. I'd shit my pants.
In all honesty they should just update the image for both {{item:3101}} and {{item:3115}}. Kind of looks a bit lazy at this point.
Oh come on, haven't you ever beat a blue sword with a book until it turned yellow?

Hey, we now live in a world where if you put together a wand, a mining tool and a bow, you get a fiery blade.

{{item:3124}}

wow technology never ceases to amaze me

im in my 3rd year and i still cant figure out how to duct tape this book to this wand to make a staff

i have learned how to beat a dead horse though, so i got that going for me
I logged in just to tell you I Can't stop laughing at this response.

Your effort is appreciated
http://www.theimaginativeconservative.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/Respect.jpg

Man I loved it when my guns used to turn into books!

RIP WotA

Right.
Season 7 kids will never understand.
No but I did stick a couple of different pieces of armor together and they turned into a rock {{item:3512}}.
Personally I took a rod that is waaaay bigger than it needs to be, wrapped a belt around it then smacked a book on it.  It somehow became golden rod with a crystal on top of it.
Don't forget the book you can combine with another book to turn into a gun and then put _another_ book in it to make another book. ({{item:3070}} rip will of ancients{{item:3070}} )

Nashor's Grill

omg perfect
 +1 this man
Wasn't even my joke. I can't remember which specific video, but it was by KiandyMundi

comes back to say it's not his joke, then gives credit to where he heard the joke. keep the +1 my friend 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Naming a sword after some renowned beast's teeth is fairly common actually.
I dub this sword, forged with the teeth of the great ferret beast, rodents denture
It should be given free to everyone who helped kill Baron.
{{champion:17}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:268}} pick/ban
they all need it to take baon though, which begs the question, how did they pull out baron's teeth before they killed baron.
{{champion:17}} has his ways
Its a sword forged from nashors tooth like inuyashas sword and his brothers sword as well.
Nashor's Sweet Tooth{{item:3115}} {{item:2054}}
U should get this for free if u kill baron.

> [{quoted}](name=ThePerson76,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PGdQYpwr,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-06-08T13:18:59.013+0000)
>
> U should get this for free if u kill baron.

Reduced Price***
No u just tear it out of his mouth after he dies.

http://66.media.tumblr.com/9a9149d26452276cb7820a64e119674f/tumblr_n6x6f8ZKTq1sdk5d7o2_r1_400.gif
But he dissolves into nothingness upon death. Including his teeth
U tear it out while fighting.
His mouth is full of acid mid-fight. Acid and the blood of your allies
But most champs can take that acid to the face pretty well.
You use base

there is no kill baron

he doesn't die

he isn't born there on the rift at 20 minutes every game

what do you guys think baron is exactly? 

please go read his story, his tooth would disappear along with him on defeat just to reappear with him when he does

this is why the league has special appointed crafters for such things, so that you **can** wield a nashor's tooth

everyone who plays league knows of at LEAST one craftsman for the league

**DORAN**

please go read this stuff guys, it's interesting for real, also the more / better we can nerd out about their lore puts pressure on Riot to work on more lore and maybe, hopefully, a movie

anyways, the item build path joke is funny, as it's nonsensical, but this is covered in the lore, so you're missing the mark on the joke.

> [{quoted}](name=aLawfulFalafel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PGdQYpwr,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2016-06-09T16:44:42.873+0000)

> he doesn't die

> anyways, the item build path joke is funny, as it's nonsensical, but this is covered in the lore, so you're missing the mark on the joke.

Do you realize that the old lore of the League is not canon anymore and the "League of Legends" do not exist, right?

Baron Nashor is not an ilusion created by summoners anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=aLawfulFalafel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PGdQYpwr,comment-id=0009000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-09T17:20:43.001+0000)
>
> are you serious?
> 
> if this is truth then this is me :
> 
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
> 
> i like the lore i know , but more reading is good :)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/creative-spotlight/dev-blog-exploring-runeterra

Read the second comment that is hidden due downvotes.

> Good question!
> No, Summoners, the Fields of Justice and the Institute are not canon within the fictional world of Runeterra. In-game, players are still referred to as summoners - but summoners won't be part of the story.
> 
>  Carnival Knights  - 2 years ago

oh shit well thank you very much :)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yeah cause a Rod, Wand and a Book make Hat.
